networkError:
We could not reach the server.
Please try again.
noConnectionError: No valid connection could be found.

signin.title: Log in
signin.strategyDomainInvalid: The domain {domain} has not been set up.
signin.serverErrorText: There was an error processing the login.
signin.returnUserLabel: Last time you signed in using...
signin.domainUserLabel: You are connected from your corporate network...
signin.passwordChangeRequiredErrorText: You need to update your password because this is the first time you are signing in, or because your password has expired.
signin.passwordLeakedErrorText: This login attempt has been blocked because your password has been leaked in a third party website. We've sent you an email with instructions on how to unblock it.
signin.popupCredentials: Enter your credentials in the pop-up window
signin.userConsentFailed: Permissions were not granted. Try again.
signin.tooManyAttemptsErrorText: Your account has been blocked after multiple consecutive login attempts.

signup.title: Sign Up
signup.headerText: Please enter your email and password
signup.serverErrorText: There was an error processing the signup.
signup.signupOnSSODomainErrorText: This domain {domain} has been configured for Single Sign On and you can't create an account. Try signing in instead.
signup.usernameInUseErrorText: The username is already in use.

passwordStrength.containsAtLeast: Contain at least %d of the following %d types of characters:
passwordStrength.identicalChars: No more than %d identical characters in a row (e.g., "%s" not allowed)

newReset.title: Password Reset
newReset.successText: We've just sent you an email to reset your password.
newReset.headerText: Please enter your email address. We will send you an email to reset your password.
newReset.serverErrorText: There was an error processing the password reset.
newReset.tooManyRequestsErrorText: You have reached the limit on password reset attempts.  Please wait before trying again.

reset.title: Password Change
reset.successText: We've just sent you an email to reset your password.
reset.headerText: Please enter your email and the new password. We will send you an email to confirm the password change.
reset.serverErrorText: There was an error processing the password reset.
reset.tooManyRequestsErrorText: You have reached the limit on password reset attempts.  Please wait before trying again.
